charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE C/S (COCAINE BASE), 50 GRAMS OR MORE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 67 months; 5 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment (A balance of $75.00 remains.)
Count II of the Indictment is dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)&;(b)(1) POSSESSION OF C/S (COCAINE BASE) WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Count III of the Indictment is dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only.
